# Warren Hardy

| birth_place=Salt Lake City, Utah
| death_date=
| death_place=
| spouse=Carol
| profession=builder and contractor
| religion=
| party=Republican
|}}
Warren B. Hardy II is a Republican member of the Nevada Senate, representing Clark County District 12 ([http://www.leg.state.nv.us/lcb/research/RedistMaps/dm72/color/sencl12.jpg map]) since 2002. Previously he served in the Nevada Assembly in 1991.
External links
